system.effect: Allows procesing of comets for waters and minerals. Can conduct Ice mining in suitable comet field in outer solar system. Locate comet with +0 Scrutiny+Detection Test, spend 1d10+5 days mining. Gives +1d5 Morale and +1 Month of Deep Void Operations, or +50 Achievement Points for ongoing endeavours. (Can be an endeavour in and of itself). One Per Vessel.
